org.plasmarobotics.jim.mechanisms

Class Drive

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.plasmarobotics.jim.mechanisms.Drive
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Mechanism

    public class Drive
extends Object
implements Mechanism
    This class controls the drive system
    Author:
    Jim

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Drive()
      Used to create a FroboDrive object to control all driving operations

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void disable()
      Method called to clean up and disable the drive system.
      boolean drive(double speed, double distance)
      The robot will drive in a straight line for a given distance using two encoders and a gyro
      void reset()
      resets the sensors on the robot
      void resetNeeded()
      tells drive its okay to reset
      void setupAutonomous()
      Meant to be run once before autonomous -sets all motor direction resets the encoders and gyro
      void setupTeleop()
      Meant to be run once before teleop.

      Turns the robot (needs upside down gyro)

      • drive

        public boolean drive(double speed,
            double distance)
        The robot will drive in a straight line for a given distance using two encoders and a gyro
        Parameters:
        speed - Speed of motors (-1 to 1 scale)
        distance - Distance (in inches) to drive
        Returns:
        true when operation is completed, false otherwise

      • smartTurn

        public boolean smartTurn(double degrees)
        Turns the robot (needs upside down gyro)
        Parameters:
        degrees - angle to rotate (degrees, not radians) positive is counter clockwise.
        Returns:
        true when operation is complete

      • stupidTurn

        public boolean stupidTurn(double degrees)
        Turns a given angle
        Parameters:
        degrees - angle to rotate (degrees, not radians) positive is counter clockwise.
        Returns:
        true when the action is completed. false otherwise.

      • resetNeeded

        public void resetNeeded()
        tells drive its okay to reset

        public void reset()
        resets the sensors on the robot
